tabGeneral.title: Overview
tabGeneral.labelConfirmInput: Customers need to confirm their configurations
tabGeneral.textAssignmentInfo: Assign a custom product template on the detail page of an existing product in order to make it customisable.
tabGeneral.helpTextStepByStep: In step-by-step mode, the options for individualising a product are displayed one after the other.
tabGeneral.helpTextConfirmInput: Individualized products can only be put into the shopping cart after confirming the individual configuration by ticking a checkbox.
tabGeneral.helpTextOptionsAutoCollapse: If this setting is active, options will close automatically after a valid input. This function is not available in step-by-step mode.

cardOption.title: Options
cardOption.textModalDelete: Do you really want to delete the option "{name}"? | Do you really want to delete these {count} options?
cardOption.emptyTitle: No options yet. | No options found.
cardOption.optionAddNotAvailableTooltip: New options can only be added using the system default language.

createOption.title: Add option
createOption.typeHelpText: The type cannot be changed afterwards.

cardExclusion.textModalDelete: Do you really want to delete the excluded combination "{name}"? | Do you really want to delete these {count} excluded combinations?
cardExclusion.emptyTitle: No excluded combinations yet. | No excluded combinations found.

optionDetailModal.noFormFound: No form found for this type.

isMultiSelectTooltip.enabled: Check to enable the customer to choose multiple values.
isMultiSelectTooltip.disabled: You can't check this option, because its associated with an exclusion.

imageupload.tooltip: Please note that file extensions are case sensitive.

optionType.itemNumberHelpText: The option product number is displayed in the order overview and describes the product number of this specific option.

surcharges.textWarningBasePrice: Please notice that a base price is required when you want to use advanced surcharges. If none of the listed price rules below are matching, the base price will be used as the fallback price.
surcharges.advancedSurchargesTooltip: Enable this option to configure advanced surcharges.
surcharges.relativeSurchargesTooltip: Enable this option to configure relative surcharges.
surcharges.selectTaxRateTooltip: Select a tax rate or enable relative surcharges to configure this option.

requiredTooltip.disabled: You can't require this option, because its associated with an exclusion

swag-customized-products-assignment-card.textModalDelete: Do you really want to delete the assignment of the product "{name}"? | Do you really want to delete these {count} product assignments?

swag-customized-products-configuration-m.title: Custom Product configuration
swag-customized-products-configuration-m.emptyConfigurationHint: This product has not been configured
swag-customized-products-configuration-m.warningImagePreview: Please note that not all file types are supported by the browser. Please use the "Download" function accordingly to display the desired image in the editing program of your choice.

swag-customized-products-condition-tree.label: Excluded combination
swag-customized-products-condition-tree.helpText: Describe the combination of option states to be excluded. Please note, that you will not be able to choose required or multi-select options for an exclusion.

swag-customized-products-product-assignm.textContent:
Custom Products enable you to offer unique and personal ecommerce experiences. Customers will be granted access to predefined customisation options on the product page. There are various possibilities, such as uploading pictures and graphics that allow for individual prints, provide various colourings or a way to submit texts for custom engravings.

Setting up templates for Custom Products is easy, too. Open the Custom Products module and load or create a customisation template. Use the select box below to assign that template to any customisable product.
